title: Soothing Chamomile Honey Tea
description: A calming bedtime tea that combines the gentle properties of chamomile with the sweetness of honey. Perfect for relaxation and better sleep.

instructions.text: Heat water to just below boiling (about 200°F/93°C). Boiling water can destroy some of chamomile's beneficial compounds.
Place chamomile flowers in a teapot or heat-proof container. If using tea bags, use 2 bags.
Pour hot water over the chamomile and cover to preserve the volatile oils.
Steep for 5-10 minutes. The longer you steep, the stronger the flavor and effects.
Strain the tea into cups, removing all plant material.
Add honey to taste while the tea is still warm. Add lemon juice if desired.
Enjoy slowly, preferably 30 minutes before bedtime for best sleep benefits.

tips: Use organic chamomile for the best quality and to avoid pesticides
Store dried chamomile in an airtight container away from light
For a stronger sleep aid, combine with passionflower or valerian
Can be enjoyed iced - brew double strength and pour over ice
healthBenefits: Aids digestion when consumed after meals
May help reduce anxiety and stress
